mapper.update: UPDATE project_query SET partnership_member_idx = #{partnershipMemberIdx}, project_idx = #{projectIdx}, project_query_category_idx = #{projectQueryCategoryIdx}, title = #{title}, raw_query = #{rawQuery}, type_cd = #{typeCd}, update_date = now() WHERE idx = #{idx}
